availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Jefferson Ward (Johnson County, Kentucky, justice of the peace, farmer, & 2nd Lieut 5th KY Inf CSA, JPJC)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer, soldier, and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Son of Shadrach Ward and Levina Ward. Married to Sarah Hicks Ward in Johnson County on November 29, 1860. Father of Shadrach W. Ward. Farmer in Johnson County in 1850. Farmer in Johnson County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Johnson County in 1863. Served in the 5th Kentucky Infantry Regiment (C.S.A.) as a second lieutenant.
